reviewText: Prepare to be mesmerized by the SM Hunter's ropes of pleasure!Are you a sadist? How about a masochist? Oh it doesn't matter, this movie has both and much much more!What appears at first to be an insanely offensive dungeon crawler turns into a tense battle of the sexes as the SM Hunter is hired to rescue a man from a roving gang of angry women out for revenge on the men of the world. This movie combines Manga-esque western styled rope romp!Enjoy the depravity!
summary: A throwback to the wild west with a sadomasochistic twist!

reviewText: Even thought there are a lot of outstanding film in Japanese Pink films, It is one of the most ourstanding one.The hero, S&M; Hunter ia asked to rescue the gay boyfriend who has been kidnapped by Girls' group bombers.This guy's weapon is not guns, swords knives whatever like that, but ropes.He just ties girls up and let them obey and let them fall in love with his ropes.You will witness outrageous hero you have never seen. It must be totally new for American audiences.This film was made in 1986, but you don't have to worry about print quality. It is very clear!

reviewText: It begins with definitions, through brief displays, of sadism, masochism and other delights. The film goes on to a man seeking the recovery of his boyfriend, kidnapped by three women who hate men. In so doing, they want to convert their captor back to heterosexual practices. Do they succeed? Is he rescued by his lover's hired help; the S&M; hunter? Does one of the captors fall in love with his ropes? What on earth does a Nazi outfit have to do with all this? If you are in the mood, it's fun to watch!Ian Hunter.Author of `e-Love'.
Title: N/A

reviewText: In typical Japanese, over-the-top fashion we have a story about a legendary S&M; hunter who uses his ropes and technique to reduce any female to a quivering mass of submissiveness. The story has a plot, sort of. It's not as good as other Pink Eiga films, but it's okay for chuckles.The basic story line is a woman-hating guy hires the hunter to resuce his partner who has been kidnapped by a gang of girls. The hunter does this with a certain amount of ropes and nudity - and a bunch of 'you gotta be kidding me' moments. After the rescue, he is confronted by a girl he had dominated earlier and she wants revenge. (What's up with the full Nazi garb she wears?) I won't spoil the ending, but if you'd stripped me, tied me, and hung me up as he does her, I'd have been screaming, well, like a girl. Unbelievable.
Title: N/A

reviewText: A man is hired to find a man's lover who has been kidnapped by a gang of girls and punish the women who did it. The lover turns out to be another man (a surprise) and the S&M hunter punishes the wrong doers with great relish primarliy using Japanese bondage. This is all done to a rousing Italian western movie music score and with tongue firmly in cheek and is pretty good black humor. You do not necessarily have to be a fan of Japanese bondage films to have fun with this film. It is definitely not a date movie though (well ....unless you have a VERY unusual date). The acting is quite good and picture quality is fantastic. This is actually the second of two films about the S&M hunter and I hope Pink Eiga releases the first one.
Title: N/A
